item.description: From Boston: Take route 138 south through Milton look for the Trail Side Museum, go past Â the museum following 138 south for .7 miles take the first left at the traffic light (Duncan Donuts will be on your right) the street name sign is missing. Go 1.1 miles the Houghtons Pond parking lot will be on the right. We will meet in the parking lot by the play ground. From route 128: Take route 138 north: this will be exit 2 towards Milton, go .2 miles, take first right at the traffic light,(Duncan Donuts will be on your right) the street name sign is missing. Go 1.1 miles the Houghtons Pond parking lot will be on the right. We will meet in the parking lot by the play ground.
item.how_to_find_us: Everybody has to be on time, THIS IS A HIKE(not a dog park like everybody is used to) because once we start it will be difficult to find us hiking on the trails in the woods. We have to be their at 11:00 am sharp we will wait only till 11:15.

group.name: Jack Russell Terrier Boston Area Group

item.name: A POST THANKSGIVING - PRE-CHRISTMAS HIKE!
